alert.note: Alert for Choctaw (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 4:53AM CDT until March 30 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Choctaw County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 530 AM CDT. * At 453 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles south of Boswell, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Hugo... Boswell... Sawyer... Soper... Kent... Goodland... Messer... Hugo Lake State Park... Grant... Ord... Fallon... Apple... Speer... Unger... Gay... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for southeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tulsa.
